warnayen mudritha upades pathrika da diwi nanguma yatathe nawa aadarsha gewaththak idikirimata kamathi ayata me dinawala labadimata katayuthu yoda atha.diwi nanguma paswani adiyara yatathe merata siyalu grama niladhari wasamwala enam grama niladhari wasam 14000 ka mema diwi nanguma wada satahana sikurada sita aarambha wiya.game grama niladhari, krushikarma paryeshana sanwardhana niladhari, samruddhi niladhari ha pawul saukhya sewikawa samanga aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaya mangin pathkarana lada aarthika sanwardhana niladhari yana game niladharihu me wadapiliwela kriyawata nanwathi.me wada piliwela yatathe yam prashnayak athnam adala pradeshiya lekam ha adala pradeshiya lekam bala pradeshaye salasum adhyaksha amatha wisthara wimasimata awasthawa thibe.
